EmailTemplate.description: Comparing QBES to Pro and Premier
EmailTemplate.name: Compare QBES Pro and Premier
EmailTemplate.subject: Comparing QBES to Pro and Premier
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Untitled Document
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
Thank you for your interest in Intuit QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions. We are dedicated to providing leading edge, easy to use business management solutions.
QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions 11.0 delivers the advanced functionality to meet complex business needs, at a cost per user comparable to or even lower than QuickBooks Pro or Premier.
You can have a maximum of 3 users with QuickBooks Pro and 5 users with QuickBooks Premier. Additional user licenses of QuickBooks Premier are available for $359.95 each. The cost for a Premier 5 User license is $1,620.00. With QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions, you start with 5 users.
See how QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions cost of ownership compares to your current QuickBooks software:
Annual Support, the QuickBooks Training DVD, and all the web-based services listed above are included FREE as part of your first year Full Service Plan membership1. In subsequent years, your 5 user Full Service Plan costs just $850 – which includes your upgrade to the latest software version, plus all of the extras listed above.
When you add up the Year 1 costs, along with typical services growing businesses like yours need, Enterprise Solutions actually costs less per license compared to Pro 3 User or Premier 3 User.
Thank you again for your interest in QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions. If you have any additional questions, please don’t hesitate to contact me.
Thank you,
(1) The Full Service Plan is good for 12 months from QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions purchase date or Full Service Plan renewal date. You have the option to add web-based services for free as an active FSP member. Service begins as of the date activated and continues through to the expiration date of your FSP plan. QuickBooks support is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week; the Enterprise Solutions team (including our U.S.-based team of product experts) is available weekdays from 4 A.M. - 7 P.M. Pacific time. Support hours exclude occasional downtime due to system and server maintenance, company events, observed U.S. holidays and events beyond our control. Intuit reserves the right to limit each telephone contact to one hour and to one incident. Active Full Service Plan members receive new version upgrades when and if released within 12 months of QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions purchase date or Full Service Plan renewal date. Terms, conditions, pricing, service offerings, and availability of the Full Service Plan are subject to change at any time without notice. U.S. only. See terms and conditions at www.qbes.com/terms
This message was sent to inform you of a critical matter. Please note that if you have chosen not to receive marketing messages from Intuit, that choice applies only to promotional materials. You will continue to receive critical notifications that are legally required or could affect your service or software.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
Note: Terms, conditions, pricing, special offers, features, and service options subject to change without notice
Intuit respects the personal nature of email and this email is in response to your request for additional information.
